com.sitewhere.spi.device

Interface IDeviceManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IDeviceManagement
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Interface for device management operations.
